content.rendered:
Directed by Santhosh Ananddram

Written by Santhosh Ananddram

Cast Puneeth Rajkumar(Yuvaraj / Arjun). Sayyeshaa Saigal(Vandhana). Sonu Gowda(Lawyer). Dhananjaya(Antony Joseph). Prakash Raj(Gurudev Deshmukh). Tarak Ponnappa(Inspector Azad (as Tharak Ponnappa)). Sai Kumar(Raghav Reddy). Sudharani(Professor). Avinash(Jayapal). Achyuth Kumar(Govind). Rangayana Raghu(Staff). Diganth(Samarth Baghwath). Vishal Hegde(Journalist). Triveni Rao(Squad Member). Kavya Shetty(Item number). Nagabhushana(Doctor). Prakash Belawadi(Shatrughan Salimath). Rajesh Nataranga(Professor). Kuri Prathap(Peon). Sadhu Kokila(Kokila Raman). Ravi Bhat(Professor). Madhu Nambiar(Flying Squad)

Languages Kannada. Telugu

Producer Vijay Kiragandur.

Production Hombale Films
